name: Cracking The Lost Code (OPEN BETA)
description:
The leader of the squad E25 is trapped inside a strange facility.

The mission is finding some gas for his ship in order to escape, but the facility has another plan, its alive, welp not really its... something else... something is controlling the defense system in order to destroy your existance. Who or what this something is? its up to you to find out.

(THIS HARDCORE GAME'S DIFFICULTY WILL MAKE RAGE QUIT, BUT WILL KEEP YOU PLAYING!)
